name: CozyRoc
description:
CozyRoc is the leading provider of third-party extensions for Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services. The company's flagship product is CozyRoc SSIS+ and includes 52 advanced components for secure communications, compression, encryption, script reuse, EDI data processing, integration with IBM DB2, Oracle, Salesforce, Amazon, Dynamics CRM, SharePoint, Advanced Email support, Advanced Excel support, Parallel Loop.
The SSIS+ product is successfully used and deployed in more than 40 countries around the world.
READ MORE...
